resources.string: Sorry, this permission is needed to use the app
Functionality of this application depends completely on location permissions. Not having them makes it useless and pointless, please try it again and grant location permissions when prompted.
Current distance to specified location is less than 100 mts. You don\'t need this right now, please select a farther location.
You have no selected a place yet, please click anywhere on the map to place a marker.
